feed.title: ServerBox Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1104
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: lang switch by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/553
  • fix: ssh alter url by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/554
  • fix: ssh tab page UI by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/555
  • new: custom foreground service on Android by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/556
  • l10n: fixed Japanese translations. by @Shin-suechtig in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/558
  • fix: backup on windows by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/563
  • opt.: back btn on scan page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/568
  • opt.: split webdav & other settings by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/569
  • fix: snippet fmt by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/570
  • l10n: Added Ukrainian lang by @CakesTwix in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/574
  • opt.: sync immediately after changes by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/577
  • opt.: spi with same id by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/585
  • opt.: redesigned settings page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/587
  • opt.: dismiss notification if no ssh conn by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/592
  • new: ios18 dark app icon by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/594
  • opt.: more virtual keys by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/596
  • new: material you icon by @GitGitro in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/599
  • [Translation] Russian fix by @MasedMSD in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/604

New Contributors

  • @Shin-suechtig made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/558
  • @CakesTwix made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/574
  • @GitGitro made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/599
  • @MasedMSD made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/604

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.1070...v1.0.1104

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1129
entry.content:
Attention / 注意

WebDAV settings should be manually reconfigured. WebDAV 等设置需要手动重新配置。

What's Changed

  • fix: editing pref store by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/618
  • fix: sftp open file on windows by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/633
  • 修复路径在windos下读取不到的问题 by @fei1025 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/630
  • Added Function keys (F1-F12) to SSH virtual keyboard options by @dsvf in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/641
  • opt.: migrate to new fl_lib by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/649
  • bug: can't share server via qr_code by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/651
  • fix: crash while opening terminal by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/658
  • opt.: display err if home widget fails by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/659
  • opt.: display settings btn in fullscreen mode by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/660
  • fix: catch crash of fg service by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/669
  • fix: disable android service related by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/670
  • opt: window title bar by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/672
  • fix: unix perm switcher by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/674
  • fix: webdav settings by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/683
  • opt.: close after saving by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/684

New Contributors

  • @fei1025 made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/630
  • @dsvf made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/641

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.1104...v1.0.1129

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1184
entry.content:
⚠️ Attention

更新此版本前，请注意备份 / Before updating this version, please take a backup

What's Changed

  • fix github action build linux by @lin-calvin in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/687
  • chore: Fns & FnRes by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/690
  • feat: record window position by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/692
  • opt: windows app icon by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/700
  • fix: window title bar might not be displayed by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/701
  • Improve Turkish Language by @mikropsoft in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/721
  • migrate: webdav_client_plus by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/729
  • reslove issue 717 about logo url and add coreelec support by @moli765 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/718
  • feat: adaptive navigation bar by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/739
  • opt: navigation bar by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/740
  • optimization: desktop UI by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/747
  • fix: android monochrome icon by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/749
  • opt.: appbar scrolledUnderElevation by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/752
  • bug: can't select file on macOS by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/754
  • opt.: editor by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/755
  • feat: searching in editor page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/756
  • fix: horizontal ssh virt keys ui by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/758
  • fix: code editor page popping by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/759
  • opt.: handle esc btn in ssh page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/761
  • opt.: ssh page sftp path checking by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/763
  • new: use generated ids for servers by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/765
  • new: parse disk info via lsblk output Fixes #709 by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/760
  • fix: cloud sync by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/769
  • opt.: custom terminal emulator by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/771
  • fix: batch delete servers by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/772
  • feat: disk smart info by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/773
  • feat: SSH page background by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/775
  • new: bio_auth -> local_auth by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/776
  • fix: examples UI of importing by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/777
  • opt.: ssh terminal ux by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/778
  • fix: Android app reload on hardware keyboard change by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/779
  • readd: serverTabPreferDiskAmount by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/780

New Contributors

  • @moli765 made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/718

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.1129...v1.0.1184

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1189
entry.content:
⚠️ Attention

  • 从低于 v1185 版本更新时，请先备份，以免可能的数据丢失。
  • Before updating from versions below v1185, please back up your data to prevent possible loss.

What's Changed

  • fix github action build linux by @lin-calvin in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/687
  • chore: Fns & FnRes by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/690
  • feat: record window position by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/692
  • opt: windows app icon by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/700
  • fix: window title bar might not be displayed by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/701
  • Improve Turkish Language by @mikropsoft in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/721
  • migrate: webdav_client_plus by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/729
  • reslove issue 717 about logo url and add coreelec support by @moli765 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/718
  • feat: adaptive navigation bar by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/739
  • opt: navigation bar by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/740
  • optimization: desktop UI by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/747
  • fix: android monochrome icon by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/749
  • opt.: appbar scrolledUnderElevation by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/752
  • bug: can't select file on macOS by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/754
  • opt.: editor by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/755
  • feat: searching in editor page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/756
  • fix: horizontal ssh virt keys ui by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/758
  • fix: code editor page popping by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/759
  • opt.: handle esc btn in ssh page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/761
  • opt.: ssh page sftp path checking by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/763
  • new: use generated ids for servers by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/765
  • new: parse disk info via lsblk output Fixes #709 by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/760
  • fix: cloud sync by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/769
  • opt.: custom terminal emulator by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/771
  • fix: batch delete servers by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/772
  • feat: disk smart info by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/773
  • feat: SSH page background by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/775
  • new: bio_auth -> local_auth by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/776
  • fix: examples UI of importing by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/777
  • opt.: ssh terminal ux by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/778
  • fix: Android app reload on hardware keyboard change by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/779
  • readd: serverTabPreferDiskAmount by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/780
  • fix: container not working by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/787
  • bug: incorrect disk smart info by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/789

New Contributors

  • @moli765 made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/718

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.1129...v1.0.1189
